title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Knowledge-Sharing Strategies in Augmented Reality-Based Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of inquiry-based learning methodologies and experience with smartphone/tablet devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can share knowledge using the five-stage inquiry process (observation-question-hypothesis-experiment-conclusion) in an augmented reality environment.
Learners can increase the frequency of knowledge-construction interactions with peers by 30% or more using AR-based collaboration tools.
Learners can demonstrate inquiry skills by linking real-world environments with digital information through location-based AR content.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
